metadata.title: CVE-2017-17432 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: OpenAFS 1.x before 1.6.22 does not properly validate Rx ack packets, whichallows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (system crash orapplication crash) via crafted fields, as demonstrated by an integerunderflow and assertion failure for a small MTU value.

criterions.comment: openafs: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
